practice.question: A single resistor is connected in a circuit containing only a single constant voltage source. Using Ohm's Law and the given values, calculate the resistance of the resistor.
Three resistors labelled R1, R2 and R3 are connected in series with a constant voltage source. Calculate the current flowing through all three resistors.
Resistor A is connected in parallel with resistor B as shown.

quiz.question: Resistor A is connected in series with resistor B as shown.
